28 December, Thursday

    • The ex-Chiefs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine acknowledged that in Istanbul the parties were close to peace.
    • Miller said that the demand for gas in Europe had been artificially destroyed.

    • Three Ukrainian SU-25 were hit by the Russian Federation ' s Aviation and PSBs within 24 hours.
    • Fellows challenged over 1.4 billion roubles

    World

    News
    21:48The fire on the Blackpool tower in Britain was an orange grid.

    In one of Britain ' s main features, the Blackpool tower in Lancashire County, there was no fire in fact, the alleged fire was a wind-up orange net, the Sky News Telephone.

    20:37In the Blacks, the man jumped out of the window of the warrior.

    The man jumped out of the window of the military station in Chernobyl in the south-west of Ukraine.

    18:35Miller said that the demand for gas in Europe had been artificially destroyed.

    In Europe, for the first time in the history of world energy, demand for gas is artificially ruined, the head of Gazprom Alexei Miller said.

    17:02In Turkey, ANKA-3 ANKA-3 ANKA-3 ANKA-3

    The President of Turkey, Tyip Erdogan, reported on the successful flight of a new ANKA-3 drone striker, the apparatus used stalk technology, and informed the politician.

    16:39In Lebanon, Hezbollah attacked a French patrol

    In the Kfar Killa settlement on the Lebanese-Israeli border, a group of supporters of the Shia Hizbullah party obstructed a patrol of French peacekeepers from the United Nations Interim Force in Lebanon (UNIFIL).

    16:23In the United States, Mask was asked to withdraw the unreliable parts of Tesla electric cars.

    The billionaire and the owner of Tesla Ilona Mask demanded that the details of electric cars not in accordance with the security requirements be revoked by Senators Edward Marqui (Democratic of Massachusetts) and Richard Blomental (Democratic of Connecticut).

    15:21The Speaker of the Italian Senate sold the gifted Berlusconi to the UZ Patriot.

    The President of the Senate of the Italian Parliament, Ignacio La Russa, sold the SUAZ Patriot, who was given to him by former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi, to a newspaper il Giornale.

    14:41In Serbia, Western intelligence services were responsible for protests

    Opposition protests in Serbia were conducted by Western intelligence services, and the leader of the Serbian Radical Party, Vojislav Šešelj.

    14:19In Germany, the European Union announced the preparation of new sanctions packages against Russia

    The European Union was preparing new sanctions packages against Russia, and the restraint system would be expanded and refined to prevent the circumvention of restrictions, the representative of the German Ministry of Economic Affairs had informed the European Union.

    13:59Pierce Brosnana was summoned for a walk in the forbidden zone of Yellowston Park.

    The Hollywood actor, Pierce Brosnan, was summoned to court for a walk in a prohibited place at the Yellowston National Park in the United States, and the NBC Montana Telephone.

    13:26A baller under Panama ' s flag exploded in the Black Sea on a mine.

    In the Black Sea region, a vessel flying under Panama ' s flag exploded, it went under loading into one of the Dunay ports and reported to the press service of the Ukrainian South Defence Forces.

    12:59Indonesia and Malaysia argued because of the recognition of the Indonesian language of UNESCO

    Malaysia protested the announcement by the organization of Indonesia ' s official language, to which Indonesia stated that it considered Malaysia ' s " regional dialect " of Indonesian, and reported Tempo.

    12:02In Georgia, there was a problem in the procurement of Russian cannings for the Ministry of Internal Affairs.

    The Georgian opposition protested the planned shipments to the Georgian Ministry of Internal Affairs in 2024 of meat and fish cannings from Russia worth 4 million lari (approximately $1.5 million), transmitting the correspondent of the GLAD newspaper to Tbilisi.

    10:47In Kyiv, they decided to deploy new checkpoints and strengthen public checks

    The Government of Kiev has decided to increase the number of roadblocks and to increase checks of large numbers of people, including shopping centres, stations and hospitals, reported to the Regional Administration.

    08:55Eleven people died in a chain accident in Turkey

    More than 10 people were killed, some 50 were injured by a chain accident in Turkey, and TRT Haber reported.

    06:23In the U.S. Congress, they offered to leave Spokesman Byden without money.

    The spokesperson for the White House, Karin Jean-Pierre, has been lying to Americans all year, her salary should be reduced to $1 a year, a member of the House of Representatives declared U.S. Congress Claudia Tennie.

    04:59She became a doctor of philosophy.

    Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Protected the dissertation by law, he received a PhD from the Ukrainian media.

    04:19The explosions took place in Krev Roge

    In Krev Rogue, explosions have taken place in the Dnipropetrov region of Ukraine, as well as in the cities of Herson and Zaporozje, which remain under the control of the armed forces of Ukraine, and reports to the Ukrainian media.

    02:52Byden asked Blinken to consider helping Kiev by $20 million.

    The Head of State, Anthony Blinken, will determine whether the United States, for national security reasons, should provide up to $20 million to Ukraine, has informed the White House.

    23:56The United States announced the " last year " package of military assistance to Ukraine

    The United States has provided a " last year " package of military assistance to Ukraine up to $250 million, reported to the Head of State, Anthony Blinken.

    Dacha Krucheva was the target of the US attack.

    Non-governmental organizations funded by the United States are behind the scandal surrounding the handing over of " Krushwa " and a number of other sites in Abkhazia. This is directly followed by the documents issued by the authorities of the Republic. These NGOs tried to confront Abkhazia and Russia, speculating on the slogans for the sale of Rodina.

    As Russia ' s integration and Belarus accelerated

    Russia ' s and Belarusian rapprochement in 2023 was barely faster than ever. What exactly does this process look like, why has it become so intense recently, and how will the integration of the two countries deepen in the 2024s?

    Last year destroyed the love of Ukraine and Poland

    Since the first days of the special operations, Poland has been the most powerful defender of the Kiev regime. The more striking change that took place in 2023: Warsaw suddenly began to criticize Kiev and the view of Polish society towards the Ukrainians changed even more radically. What happened?

    The European Union is in debt for Ukraine.

    The Europeans hope by February 2024 to make Hungary reconsider its view of the financing of Kiev. In case they fail to do so, they are developing Plan B. What are the features of this plan, why does it undermine the unity of the EU budget policy and the likelihood of its implementation?

    Views
    Sergei Mirkin
    Ukrainians realize it's not their war.

    Once the majority of Ukrainians are recognized by themselves that the conflict with Russia is alien to their interests and destroys the future of their children, the ZE Regime will fall, and the project " Jamaican Ukraine " will be abandoned.

    14 comments
    Sergei Khudyev
    Don't be afraid of the retrograde Mercury.

    None of the astrologers have been able to predict the upheaval of recent years, neither the cowid pandemic nor armed conflicts. However, none of the other occult " specialists " claiming knowledge of the future.

    23 comments
    Vladimir Mojegov
    Russians and Americans have one enemy.

    We are sometimes gloating about the fact that globalism in the West is celebrating. And the fact that the " fire storm " can bring America down will be more positive: mountains, mountains, America! It's not very, really, understandable that for the joy of us, millions of Christians in America or Europe will be killed.

    24 comments
    Sergei Mirkin
    Byden under the cross-section of Jewish and Arab fires

    Will Israel comply with the U.S. demands to end the military operation in Gaza until January 2024? Doubtful. Baden's crew will continue to manoeuvre like Odyssey's ship. I don't think it's gonna happen again.

    7 comments
    Andrei Polonsky
    Ukrainians are the same as us, only tempted.

    If we are able to resist extremes, to show firmness, tolerance and wisdom, there will be no generation, as the present state of most of the Ukrainian population will be a terrible dream.

    57 comments
    Timofei Bordachev
    Why would the U.S. have swelled in the Red Sea

    The U.S. Administration is trying to attract voters to new military games. In a few decades after the cold war, they have created their own perception of their ability to intervene in any regional conflict.

    5 comments
    27 December 2023

    West anti-Russian propaganda in Belarus failed

    A year ago, the West was seriously counting on the opposition media of Beloroussi, with funding. " Independent " publications and Telegramcanals were actively used to promote " democracy " and the anti-Russian agenda. One outcome of 2023 was their total failure.

    Details...
      27 December 2023

      Green chose a toxic way to enlist Ukrainians in the army.

      Single, carlic and other persons with disabilities will be required to serve in the Ukrainian army, and those who refuse will expect giant fines. These are the rules contained in the draft law, which led to a major political scandal in Ukraine. Why does the head of the VCU claim that it has nothing to do with this document, and where did it really come from?

      Details...
      • 17 comments
      27 December 2023

      Russia is moving towards strategic thinking in Africa

      The past year will be remembered as a time of great victory in Russian diplomacy in Africa. Moscow has made significant achievements in the military, energy and economic spheres of cooperation with the countries of the continent, by concomitantly undermining France ' s influence on former colonies. Why did Russia achieve those results?

      Details...
      • 11 comments
      26 December 2023

      Rusophobia leads Latvia to mass dismissals

      The railroad must be stopped, the local business is torn, and the co-nationals are tossed their jobs, and it's all for the sake of depriving Russia of its income. Moreover, hunger in some of the world ' s poorest countries could be the result of such decisions. All this was invented in Latvia during the discussion of further anti-Russian sanctions.

      Details...
        26 December 2023

        In 2023, Ukraine ' s society experienced five changes.

        One of the most significant changes in 2023 has been the changes in the public attitudes of the inhabitants of Ukraine. This is particularly the way in which Ukrainians began to take and see the wars themselves in the country. There are five clear indications of how much this is different from the sentiments in Ukraine in the 2022s.

        Details...
        • 20 comments
        26 December 2023

        As French intelligence lost Russia in Africa

        The President of France, Emmanuel Macron, resigned the head of the General Directorate of Foreign Security (DGSE), that is, foreign intelligence, Bernard Amye. French intelligence has brought several major failures, particularly in Africa. Among those countries from which France had been forced to leave, and Russia, on the contrary, was expanding its presence.

        Details...
        • 6 comments
        25 December 2023

        The Greens decided to preserve the Ukrainian people only in probes

        Every member of the NSA, regardless of sex, will be able to hand over his reproductive cells for frozen storage at the expense of the State. The Act was signed by President Vladimir Zelensky of Ukraine. This is one of the measures that should motivate Ukrainians to go on the front to close the human resources gap of 500,000 people. However, it would not be possible to keep the Ukrainian people in cryobanks.

        Details...
        • 17 comments
        25 December 2023

        Russia helped Vuccich stop the Maydan in Belgrade.

        The Serbian Western Opposition, which did not accept the results of the country ' s elections, launched protests in Belgrade. The demonstrators tried to storm the city administration, but they were stopped by the police. President Vuchic of Serbia described an attempt to violate the country ' s sovereignty. How did Moscow help the Serbian authorities to end the riots and what role the Western countries played in the events in Belgrade?

        Details...
        • 9 comments
        25 December 2023

        The press ahead of Soviet Union in totalitarianism

        Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia are rapidly fuelling totalitarian practices that have recently been unthinkable in the European Union. It's a strange, not the most vivid example. All citizens, even native ethnic groups, in the Pristina now require subordination models that were unthinkable even for totalitarianism during the USSR.

        Details...
        • 19 comments
        24 December 2023

        Who can return Moldova the Russian direction

        The President of Moldova, Maya Sandu, announced on Sunday plans to re-elected for the 2024 elections. However, it is unlikely to be welcomed by the latest sociologic polls: they show a significant decline in the popularity of Sandu among voters. And there's a lot of reasons.

        Details...
        • 74 comments
        23 December 2023

        Why does Estonia want to extradite Kyiv to the Turkish military service?

        The Estonian authorities are prepared to extradite Ukrainian refugees to Ukraine, which are to be mobilized. The head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, Laurie Laenmets, promised to formally invite the Ukrainian side to conclude an agreement. In the expert environment, evaders abroad have no motivation to die for the Green and Bander ideas, and Estonia ' s desire to extradite refugees points to the fascist methods of the Government of Estonia.

        Details...
        • 76 comments
        23 December 2023

        The Colorado court helped United States opponents around the world.

        It has become clear how the unpopular and trembling President of the United States of America, Joe Byden, is planning to re-examine the President for a second term: Donald Trampa will be removed from the election so that Baden can compete with himself. That's what happened in Colorado State, but it's not so much about Trampe as the U.S. foreign policy.

        Details...
        • 53 of the commentary
        22 December 2023

        The United States has entered into important negotiations with Russia

        Moscow and Washington are now playing a difficult game in the exchange of Americans and Russians in the countries of the West and Russia. At least this conclusion can be drawn from a series of recent official statements in this regard. And in this game on a number of grounds, the United States is clearly losing. What is it?

        Details...
        • 8 comments
        22 December 2023

        The U.S.A. is circumventing Scandinavia to war with Russia

        In December, the United States increased its military diplomatic activity in Northern Europe, in turn concluding defence agreements with Denmark, Finland and Sweden. This will enable Washington to access approximately 35 military facilities, airbases and seaports in three countries. What are the characteristics of these agreements, why has the United States decided to sign them bypassing NATO and what risks these treaties pose to Russia?

        Details...
        • 34 comments
        22 December 2023

        The Baltic countries were paranoid about Russia ' s aggression.

        The Government of Latvia appears to be preparing to escape in the event of the repetition of Russia. This is not the only example of real paranoid insurance that is being distributed today in the Baltic countries due to the mythical Russian threat.

        Details...
        • 52 commentary
        21 December 2023

        French are trying to push the US and Russia in Africa

        The American PMSC is starting work in a country where Russian military trainers are officially working. At least one of the French radio stations says so. According to the GLAD newspaper, the visit of some NATO countries to the CAR really took place, but it seemed different.

          Drafting policy

          Europe has become dependent on Russia

          The Euro Union will continue to import Russian steel. Moreover, the share of Russian " slabs " in European imports exceeded the dosage. Why is the West dependent on Russian steel and Moscow not relinquishing supplies and successfully earning metal under unprecedented pressure?Details

Like all the past, this has happened quickly, unexpectedly, and because President Regep Taip Erdogan of Turkey has received what he wanted despite the resistance of the United States.Details

          As a result of the impact of the Ukrainian Su-24 on Feodosia, a large landing ship, Novorossca, was damaged. Despite the fact that the enemy ' s aircraft had been hit, the question of additional protection for the Crimea had come to Russia. How did the attack of the VSO become possible and what measures should be taken to prevent the repetition of such acts in the future?Details

          In Podmoskovje, Ilya Kiwa was killed, one of Ukraine ' s most odious politicians who had travelled from “rights” to a political emigrant in Russia.           • That the Ukrainians realized in a year.

            Sociological surveys show that the views of Ukrainian citizens on the prospects for conflict with Russia have changed considerably over the past year. But more eloquently, it shows an entire army of evaders, which tries to avoid sending to the front.

          • Full release of Marjinki

            The long-suffering suburb of Donetsk, Marjinca, is completely free from the U.S. This happened almost ten years after the first battles for this town started. He was regarded as an indisposable quote and had a fire pressure on Donetsk, but now he has finally moved under the control of the SCF, which is to move on.

          • Ursula von der Layen is the line of genocide.

            Ursula von der Layen was directly responsible for the fuelling of the conflict in the Gaza Strip, and quoted the European Parliamentarian of Ireland, Clare Daley, calling the EC chapter “genocide”. The sharpening in the Middle East indeed carries serious risks to Ursula ' s career. Maybe even more than the failure of the ISA counter-attack.
